entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
